title: Framerate Drop
body: Since the maintenance earlier today there has been a huge framerate drop whenever I play on the Howling Abyss map.  I play with over average settings on Summoners Rift & have a constant 55-60fps, yet since today I am lucky if I can get over 30fps with everything set to the lowest settings possible. Prior to today I was running at around 60fps on howling abyss.
